question: Which of the following is true about the temperature trends in City Y during 2023?

options.A: The temperature was highest in July and lowest in January.
options.B: The temperature steadily declined over the first half of the year.
options.C: The temperature was highest in January and lowest in July.
options.D: The temperature remained constant throughout the year.

explanation: The inverted Y-axis makes it appear that temperatures are decreasing when they are actually increasing. July has the highest temperature (25°C) and January has the lowest (2°C), but the inverted scale makes this relationship misleading.
